mapper.insert: insert into comu_reply(reply_no,comu_no,reviewer,content,regdate) values(reply_no_seq.nextval,#{comu_no},(select userid from member where NICKNAME=#{reviewer}),#{content},sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from comu_reply where comu_no=#{comu_no} order by reply_no desc
mapper.update: update comu_reply set content=#{content} where reply_no=#{reply_no}
mapper.select: select comu_no from comu_reply where reply_no=#{reply_no}
